hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin 15-Minute Volume Spike Reversion (AVAX, DOGE, PEPE)
hypothesis_content.statement: When AVAX, DOGE, or PEPE experiences a 15-minute volume spike > 500% of 20-period average accompanied by price move > ±4%, price will revert 50% of the spike move within 90 minutes with >60% probability across all regimes except STRESS.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Retail-driven altcoins often see exaggerated moves on news/rumors that are quickly faded by algorithmic traders. Volume spikes indicate exhaustion of one-sided order flow.
entry_conditions: Absolute price move > 4% in same period
Fade the move (short if +4%, long if -4%)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial spike move
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price extends beyond 150% of initial spike move

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Win rate drops below 55% during BULL regimes, or more than 40% of trades hit time exit.
